text.sentence: I wanted to see if the address worked.
We had a good time in NO.
We definitely want to go back.
It was really crowded, but fun.
The weather was good and the food was great.
How is DC? Have you seen any of the sights yet?
I wanted to ask if you can help with C&C on the 16th and 17th of May when we are in Chicago.
I know your schedule just got alot more hectic, so let me know.
They can stay in Conroe on Fri and Sat.
We leave Wed night and return Sun morning.
It would mean be staying at our house on those nights and getting them to school.
If you can't, we will try to get one of the neighbors.
See you when you get back.
